website_summaries.verdict: Warm, cozy, and festive, these color-coordinated pajamas hail from a trusted company. The crew neck top and modest holiday design appeal to lots of people.
pros: Pants have a comfortable elastic waistband
Company offers a wide range of sizes for both dogs and people
Some folks have even put these pajamas on their cat
cons: Kids' sizes are polyester flannel, not cotton
Also, kids' sizes don't have drawstring waist like adult sizes do

customer_reviews.title: Quality Does NOT Match Pricing!!
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Ladies medium fit as expected for 5’6” 145 lb woman. Purchased matching outfit for service dog; color match & materials were exact. Colors were bright and true to the ad photos. CONS: Slipshod workmanship on ladies set! (See photos) Laundered on **gentle** before wearing and the seam on one of the pant legs came apart requiring repair. Strings also protruding from the top in several places. (Wouldn’t be surprised if that starts coming apart soon, too.) Very disappointed that these required mending even before the first wear—especially for the price we paid. $50, and definitely not up to the quality expected at that price. We’ve purchased $20 pajama sets in the past that held up better than this.
customer_reviews.author: NV Rush Fan

customer_reviews.title: Very very thin
customer_reviews.text: Purchased four sets of these for my kids and their cousins to wear for Christmas. They are incredibly thin. I wouldn't call the pants flannel at all, just thin cotton like thin t-shirt material. We live in the Southeastern US so hardly a cold climate but no way would these be appropriate for wearing in winter. They ARE soft and look nice, but totally impractical and not worth the high price tag.
customer_reviews.author: M. Slawter

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: LX does not always mean that the wearer is wide than normal. it might mean that the wearer is taller than normal. I wish more companies would realize this. I am 5"11. Much taller than wider. The shirt and bottoms in a women's XL could be longer. Or offer "tall" as a choice in sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Love Pajama Gram
customer_reviews.text: We love seeing our grandchildren's faces when they open their PajamaGram pj's on Christmas Eve each year.This has become our tradition that our grandchildren look forward to. We get them for mom,dad,grandson and granddaughter , even Lucy the dog. This year they facetimed us so we would not miss out on the excitement !!! Always such good quality . Thank you. Janie and Tom
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality pajamas
customer_reviews.text: Go these for the whole family. They fit mildly loose but is expected for pajamas. They are warm overall with thicker material. Did not shrink when we washed them for ourselves or the kids 2T and 5T. The 2T pants do need to be rolled up a seem but should work for most kids. Did notice that the woman's pants do not have pockets and the men's do have pockets. Seems to be more an issue with pants design in general between genders that I hear complaints about regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: BEST COMFY GIFT
customer_reviews.text: SO SOFT AND CUDDLY FOR MY DOG. THE FAMILY MEMEBERS WERE SO DISSAPPOINTED THAT THEY, TOO, DIDNT GET MATCHING PJs TO HIM. IM STILL HEARING ABOUT THIS FOR MONTHS. FOR THAT MATTER, I'LL BE ORDERING NEXT CHRISTMAS FOR MYSELF, AS WELL.
customer_reviews.author: CAT

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for our 4 kids. The sizing was inconsistent with some of the pants being too big and shirts too small. One of the shirts was even made of different fabric. The quality was poor and one of the pants tore right away. Not worth the money. I could've spent a fraction of the price at Wal-mart and gotten nicer pajamas.
customer_reviews.author: J. Parker

customer_reviews.title: These are very cute!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something cutesy for my husband and I for Christmas morning and these PJ's were just the thing! They seem like they are pretty well made and not too thin. I'm about 5'4 and 180 lbs and the XL shirt fit just right while the pants are on the bigger side for me. It's not a big deal since I just lounge around with this set. Overall, I think they are a nice set and didn't seem to shrink at all after washing.
customer_reviews.author: D Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Cute Christmas pajamas!
customer_reviews.text: I needed some Christmas pajamas and really liked these. They were more pricey but they do fit as expected and are a nice quality. I just wish that the pants had pockets and that the top was not plain. However, I did purchase a red glitter Merry Christmas decal and ironed it on myself and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: These are the best pajamas my family has ever worn
customer_reviews.text: These are the best pajamas my family has ever worn. They are soft and very comfortable. The quality surpasses all! They are expensive but worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality pajamas
customer_reviews.text: Family really enjoyed the matching pajamas and we selected a design good for all of winter not just Christmas. It says they run large and they do. Children's fit just as expected but my son because of shoulder width etc always purchases x-large; in this case that was much too large. So don't size up at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave these as a gift. My family gives Xmas jammies for Thanksgiving. We call it the secret Turkey. So the family I got is two adults and a cat. This was perfect since it included pet options as well!!!! Loved by all.
customer_reviews.author: Alison A

customer_reviews.title: Drawstring tore and came out at first wash
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected, quality fabric and nice pattern. Wife says they are comfortable. Draw string fell apart after first washing. No clue why it’s a 3 piece draw string sewn together. No clue why it fell apart so easily. Bought Pajamagram brand a few years back and the quality was far better. Concerned the quality may be slipping as the brand grew. Unacceptable, especially considering the price. 2 stars because my wife says she should still be able to wear without the draw string and/or I ought to be able to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for matching pjs this Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for matching pjs this Christmas. Soft and comfortable. Only complaint is that there were no pockets on the women’s! There were however on the men’s.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Solid Purchase
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our family for Christmas. They had ones for the whole family to include the dog which was great. Clothes are comfortable and fit well. I wish the women’s had pockets but I understand that is not the trend. After washing the sleeves of the women’s shirt seemed short for my personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: The pants were fine, and the child's size was fine
customer_reviews.text: Bought the men's and boys sizes. The men's pajama shirt was ridiculously small. The pants were fine, and the child's size was fine. Hubby wore it anyway so as not to disappoint our grandson but took it off as soon as he could.
customer_reviews.author: Kat64

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.😁👌
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Light weight. Draw string waist. The toddler and infant sizes had reinforced cuffs on the pj. bottoms. Nice feature. I bought 5 pairs in 5 different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Peachy S

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love 'em!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandsons. The shirt is super soft and the pajama pants are too. I like that they can wear these even after Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Bee

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfortable, roomy.
customer_reviews.text: Pajamas are cute and comfortable. They have an elastic waistband and faux drawstring. The waistband is practical for a toddler but the faux drawstring is not. They seem to be slightly large, but our 3-yr-old is petite, so hopefully it will just be room to grow over the next year.
customer_reviews.author: Laura W

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: My family loved these PJ’s for Christmas Eve in the mountains. Only one thing we thought was odd out of 7 pairs of pJ’s only 3 of the pants had pockets. Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: KCW

customer_reviews.title: Adorable but if you have to return your credit takes forever
customer_reviews.text: We wear matching pajamas as a tradition. Everyone enjoys themselves more. The only thing is. I had ordered by accident a double order. It has been 2 months and I’ve yet to get my credit for 3 sets!!!! I returned them a few days after recieveing them and they were untouched.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah T

customer_reviews.title: A Big Hit This Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: I bought matching pajamas for my wife, me and our dog. I presented them a couple of days before Christmas and this ended up being the hit of Christmas. My wife LOVES anything Christmas. My only wish was that I would have bought one for the cat too. He also LOVES Christmas! I am pretty pleased with the quality of the pajamas as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Love these PJs
customer_reviews.text: Love these PJs! They fit great, are soft and not too heavy! We planned to ware them only for Christmas Eve - but have worn them every day since.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Cox

customer_reviews.title: The fit was perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought, pjs for my who family and all of them fit perfect and feel really nice, can't wait to wear them for the holidays!!
customer_reviews.author: DFergy

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and warm
customer_reviews.text: Great product, my son wears them all the time, slightly baggy like jammies should be, super soft and very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Jarnagin

customer_reviews.title: We are incredibly happy with our pajamas
customer_reviews.text: We are incredibly happy with our pajamas. They fit great and are super cozy. The customer service is also terrific! It was easy peasy to order online, especially if you are trying to get matching Christmas pjs for the entire family including your dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son hates pants but it's freezing out. He ...
customer_reviews.text: My son hates pants but it's freezing out. He boycotted pj's for years and only wore boxers. But these pj's... my 10 year old actually thanked me for. Had to buy a second pair... cause these are the only thing he will wear to bed now. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Baggy crotch area and slightly bigger then stated.
customer_reviews.text: The pants have an awkward bag in the crotch area of the pants. But length and fit otherwise fits good. The small dog size (which followed the fit instructions for) is a little too big.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: These turned out very well. There was a mixup on the order but this was fixed very quickly and everything was great. Lots of family fun with everyone. Thanks for your professionalism.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: So Soft!
customer_reviews.text: These are the softest PJs ever! Will definitely order again next year! Pants are all a little long on the kiddos, but they are a bunch of shorties right now, so that was expected. :)
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: No pockets for women's sizes
customer_reviews.text: Love the pajamas and fit for me and my furry family. One major issue we have though is the latent sexism in the sizing. Why on Earth would my pajama bottoms have pockets and my wife's doesn't? Equal rights, equal tights. Put pockets on womens pajamas. They don't need to be formfitting workout gear.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: bought for my daughters dog
customer_reviews.text: They were a great match to my daughter's previously purchased pajamas. Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: They look so gorgeous on my daughter and her family. I am so pleased. Quality as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Bing

customer_reviews.title: Cut small
customer_reviews.text: Good Product, but hard to determine sizes electronically. The description suggested getting the "right size" and not to choose a larger size, but the pajamas are cut small in reality. My suggestion is to purchase the next size up. Outside of the size mishap (which is substantial) the clothing and look are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Youngshoq

customer_reviews.title: Great pajamas!
customer_reviews.text: These pajamas were very true to size and made of soft, quality material. Very cute and festive, great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Elysha

customer_reviews.title: The PJ’s fit my daughter perfectly which is surprising because ...
customer_reviews.text: The PJ’s fit my daughter perfectly which is surprising because nothing fits her. She’s skinny so usually if it fits her waist it’s too short. Need more of these!
customer_reviews.author: Katie O

customer_reviews.title: Christmas PJ fun!
customer_reviews.text: Did family pictures all dressed the same 💕 Customer service is awesome!!! Very fast shipping too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: How the product wears.
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that my cloth fit me, my wife and dogs. That made it a good Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: maggie

customer_reviews.title: Material of product and the fit are very important.
customer_reviews.text: They are for Christmas gift to my son and his children. He tried his on to see if they fit and they did. The children have not tried theirs on as they will be opening them on Christmas Eve. I measured them to some of their other clothes and I fee certain they will fit. I have washed all three pair and my son tried them on after I washed them.
customer_reviews.author: Ann  Keane

customer_reviews.title: Ver well made pjs
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for more college age son and my 13 year old son. They both really liked them and wore them way longer then I expected. They didn't want to take them off. Very good quality and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Will order Pajama Grams again!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the colors. They were as expected as well as size. The order came promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I liked the pjs just really pricey. Some reviews I read said they run small. I thiught they ran a killer big.
customer_reviews.author: William M. Nall

customer_reviews.title: Great matching set
customer_reviews.text: Love these matching pjs for me and my dog. Can’t wait for Christmas morning in them. Most reasonably priced matching set I’ve found so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mgrand25

customer_reviews.title: Pockets for men not women boo
customer_reviews.text: My only issue is the men's pants have pockets and the women's didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Easy gift
customer_reviews.text: I always include a PajamaGram as one of the wife's Christmas gifts. One less thing to have to worry about on her gift list.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: nice quality just needs to be a little longer, but then again we're a tall family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I hope that once the PJ sets are washed they will fit truer to size but they are comfy and look as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good product for families
customer_reviews.text: I liked the way the pajamas fit my family comfortably. I need sizes from a 4t to a 2X in men. The pajamas fit me and the children with a little extra space. My husband’s was true to size. He could have benefited from having a 3X. A 3X was not an option when I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna

customer_reviews.title: My family loved these jammies!
customer_reviews.text: They were a huge hit, even with the teen boy! Well made, very cozy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: chaskagirl

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I liked the feel and the fit. Didn't like that I can't reorder in another size.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are Christmas gifts but they look wonderful, just wished they had pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Malzahn

customer_reviews.title: Adult pajamas
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied with quality. Men (XL) and Women's (2 x) legs are a little long.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Carmack

customer_reviews.title: Comfy af bottoms
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. The ladies small top was on the tighter side and the bottoms were very oversized. But bottoms are very comfy! Just don’t care for the tightness of the shirt. Also wish the ladies bottoms had pockets!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Page

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality is amazing. The flannel is soft and of high quality.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Color didn’t work out but there really great pajamas for the kids
customer_reviews.author: melissa kingma

customer_reviews.title: No pockets in women's sizes
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one for my husband, my 6lb dog, and I. They were super comfy and great lengths in the top and bottoms. Only negative is the women's pants don't have pockets like the men's. So next year I'll order a small in mens do I can have pockets too
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: These are great fun pj's for the Holidays.
customer_reviews.text: Washes well, doesn't shrink. I'm disappointed that the women's pants are so big. Top runs smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Smith

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is way off
customer_reviews.text: The people sizes run really large and the dog sizes run really small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Eve gifts that should be well received
customer_reviews.text: I can’t wait until Christmas Eve to present everyone in our family with a pair of these nice pajamas. They look so comfy!
customer_reviews.author: cathyleemaxwell

customer_reviews.title: Comfy PJ's!
customer_reviews.text: The sizes were perfect! The pajamas were soft, and made of high-quality material. Very comfy! Our family buys Christmas pajamas every year. I'll definitely order from this site year after year!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and warm
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these pjs. Wears them to school for pj day and loves how comfortable they are
customer_reviews.author: Bruley-Marchessault

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Cozy and Superb Quality!
customer_reviews.text: These PJ’s are super cozy and extremely well made.. well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Lee Hall

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality just a little snug--I like my pj's to be a little bigger--I bought a medium which just fits--I would get a large next time
customer_reviews.author: heven01

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I just love the way my son's family (Including the dog), look. Very well made product.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: The quality and fit are perfect. Warm and cozy feel.

customer_reviews.title: Total disappointment Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my family and not one pair fit. They were washed in cold water and air dryer. The pants are so small

customer_reviews.title: Pajamagram - best pajamas ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered pajamagram pj's for myself before. The fit is good, they run big so order your size. This will be our first Christmas with matching pajamas. Even the puppy! Love pajamagram!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Card worthy.
customer_reviews.text: The family loved their PJs! Will be ordering more for next holiday season.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift for my daughter and her family.  Fit was perfect !
customer_reviews.text: They really liked the matching PJ's for the holidays. The pj's were kind of expensive so it is not something I would do every year.
customer_reviews.author: Diane E. Stoelker

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality at the expense of size is worth considering how in my opinion it is better to take the size all the same, smaller
customer_reviews.author: sergey

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality! Waaayyyy overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality! Waaayyyy overpriced!! pants ripped after two washings. Amazon needs a “negative ⭐️ “ option for products like these pajamas.
customer_reviews.author: SueRuz

customer_reviews.title: Very nice PJ’s
customer_reviews.text: Yearly Christmas tradition to get holiday PJ for 3 grown kids, spouses and now a first Grandchild, 9 in total. It is great material. They are very well made. Best PJ so far!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Broderick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tweens family Christmas pictures
customer_reviews.text: Loved these! My son wore them for family Christmas pictures and they were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Angel1114

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfortable, but no pockets for the ladies.
customer_reviews.text: My husband, myself, and my son each got a set. They fit great and they're comfortable. I do have one gripe, though. Why the heck do the women's pants not have pockets? I wasn't annoyed until I noticed that the men's do. Give women pockets too! Dang it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Uptegraft

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made product. I wouldn't put it on my dog--or wait--I bought it for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P.

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: We used this for our Christmas card in for a pajama party
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Top and bottom two different sizes!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the women’s x-Lg and received a large top and a 1x bottom! The top fit fine but the bottoms were huge!!! I also ordered the men’s in lg for hubby and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: bill n sue

customer_reviews.title: Family PJ's
customer_reviews.text: This is an additional pair of PJ's. The whole family wears these on Christmas Morining. Lots of fun and cute photos!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gale Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great PJ's
customer_reviews.text: Pajamas were loose and comfortable. I got a men's large, women's medium and the small dog and they all fit great. These Pajamas made for a great Christmas picture!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Made nicely Thought top was a little small for a womens ...
customer_reviews.text: Made nicely Thought top was a little small for a womens large

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving them as Christmas presents tomorrow - so we will see how they fit tomorrow! But they look great!

customer_reviews.title: Loved them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair for my daughter, her husband and granddaughter for Christmas morning for pictures. They fit just right and great quality.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy jammies
customer_reviews.text: The whole family loved them and they are very comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Max loves his PJs
customer_reviews.text: The whole family loves their PJs, especially Max our Yorkie!

customer_reviews.title: A forewarning about the expected fitting of the garment.
customer_reviews.text: We had to wash the pajamas in order to find out if the fit was going to be OK. Luckily, washing did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Donald S. Piwnica

customer_reviews.title: Pajamas fit 6 of us well
customer_reviews.text: I ordered pajamas for 2 teenagers, 1 regular size adult, 3 plus size adults, and a large dog and they all fit perfectly. We are very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Hardester

customer_reviews.title: So very disappointed. Tops were way too small and shrunk even ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 pairs of these pjs. One for myself and one as a Christmas gift. So very disappointed. Tops were way too small and shrunk even more after wash. Very embarrassing gift. I expect a complete refund.
customer_reviews.author: KATHIE WHITE

customer_reviews.title: Great feel but sizing is off.....
customer_reviews.text: The pants were great, cozy and well made. The issue I found was that the top didn't correspond with the bottoms size-wise. I bought 7 pairs of these pajamas ranging from a child's sizing to an XXL for an adult male. All of the pants were a bit big for the size chosen and all the tops were a bit small. I would suggest allowing the consumer to buy the pieces separately so they could choose the best fit for them.
customer_reviews.author: Cowbell58

customer_reviews.title: Love the softness
customer_reviews.text: They do run on the bigger size but they are comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! We wore them for xmas photos. They were a perfect fit, and good quality.

customer_reviews.title: Family and dog’s pjs
customer_reviews.text: I just didn’t like the women’s pj has no pockets otherwise it is comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Made well and comfy for my 5 year old. Arrived in a timely manner.

customer_reviews.text: Colors are great, pants are warm. But too small and shrank in the wash!

customer_reviews.title: They fit each family member great! They are so well made and have become ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered family pajamas the last 3 years! They fit each family member great! They are so well made and have become a great tradition!
customer_reviews.author: Debra J Smith

customer_reviews.title: Sizing not correct!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not the sizes I ordered- runs extremely small and pants are soooo short

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors and great quality.I'm very happy with my purchase

product_meta.title: PajamaGram Family Pajamas Matching Sets - Matching Christmas PJs for Family
feature_bullets: ROOMY FIT - Our PJs are designed to be relaxed & generously oversized. You may find they RUN LARGE. We recommend if you are between sizes, you SIZE DOWN one size smaller. See size chart below.

COZY AND COMFORTABLE - Your entire family will love these super-comfy flannel family pajamas matching sets thanks to the soft full length plaid pants with a stretchy elastic waist and coordinating long-sleeve top.
A HOLIDAY MUST-HAVE - Whether it's for Christmas morning or breakfast with Santa, these family two-piece pajamas are a must-have for a festive family holiday celebration.
WARM AND SOFT - Everyone will be toasty warm and comfortable on Christmas morning thanks to these pajamas! The matching family style makes for beautiful photos.
HIGH QUALITY - Adult styles are made of 100 percent cotton and kids' made from 100 percent polyester flannel, making the set is super soft and cozy, plus flame resistant and machine washable.
GREAT GIFT - For a family gift on Christmas Eve, there's no better option than this festive holiday PJs set that they can wear in the morning and year-round, too!
